page.title: 16Holmfirth Primary School
page.content: Holmfirth Primary School(locally known as Nabb) was built in 1914.At first it was an infant school.Later on it became a secondary school before becoming the present junior and infant school in 1964.At present we have 168 children in the school.In 1983-84 quite a few{modernisations}took place.A new staff room and secretaries office was made and a two classroom extension was added.We have six full-time{teachers,}two part-time and four peripatetic teachers who teach cello,violin,guitar and recorder.We are lucky to have a lot of{land}around the school.This includes two playing fields and an area of woodland.A new pond is being built at the bottom of the large field and we have an adventure playground on the small field.From our school there is a beautiful view down the Holme Valley.
